projects.title: BAiO Insurance Edition
projects.description: Implementation and enhancement of consulting packages as well as technical enhancements for the SAP Insurance Edition demo systems. This involved customizing consulting packages for Sales && Service scenario,	enhancements in WEB UI for integration with SAP FS PM System for creation of offer. This if followed by service scenario for claims management for a given policy.

projects.title: Implementation of SAP CRM for Program LevenBankKeten SAP for Achmea
projects.description:
As teamlead for the SAP CRM team, I had the pleasure to work with a highly motivated team of professionals to build a very complex process in CRM that highly interacts with MS SharePoint, SAP Insurance, SAP Banking, SAP BW, StreamServe and OpenText.
During our project, we managed to build a integrated solution that is not only supporting the processes for retention, but also build the basis for new processes that Achmea is currently implementing for new sales.

projects.title: DoD Certification. - Records Management

projects.title: SAP CRM Investigative Case Management
projects.description: SAP Investigative Case Management for Public Sector collects and administers all investigation data and provides them for analysis with software products like the Palantir analysis platform, which are designed for the needs of the public security community. Here SAP CRM's UI layer was used. Authorization objects depending on various roles were developed on the UI layer.

• Integration with backend SAP IS-U using HCI.
